name: Compsognathus
description: The Compsognathus is a small, agile beast known for its speed and stealth. It has a slender body and blends well in tall grass, making it efficient for ambush tactics.
memorable: Its ability to camouflage in grass and use pack tactics makes it particularly dangerous when encountered in groups.
goals: Typically acts as a nuisance or minor enemy, often preferring to ambush its foes with stealth.
relations: Often found in packs, it works well with others of its kind to leverage its Pack Tactics ability.
environment: Commonly inhabits grasslands or areas with tall vegetation.
strengths: Excels in stealth and can gain significant advantages in quick, coordinated attacks when in numbers.
weaknesses: Very low physical strength and charisma, making it ineffective in direct confrontations outside of ambush tactics.
attacks: Bite attack that deals 4 piercing damage, with a good chance to hit due to Pack Tactics.
most_powerful_ability: Grasslands Camouflage allows for advantage on stealth checks when hiding, significantly enhancing ambush potential.
senses: Has a passive perception of 12, allowing it to notice threats reasonably well.
skills: Proficient in stealth with a +6 bonus, making it highly effective at remaining hidden.
additional_information: Utilizes teamwork effectively through Pack Tactics.
Can roll twice for stealth checks in tall grass.
test_queries: quick agile creature that hides in grass
small beast with pack tactics ability
fragile dinosaur that excels in stealth
